title: LISTEN: Premier League Live podcast - Burnley 1-1 Man City
description: Listen to the Premier League Live podcast as Gary Neville, Thierry Henry and Tom Heaton joined Kelly Cates to reflect on Burnley's 1-1 draw with Man City.
content: Johann Berg Gudmundsson's late strike cancelled out Danilo's first-half stunner as Premier League leaders Manchester City were held to a hard-fought draw at Turf Moor.The draw sees City's gap close to 13 points after goals from Romelu Lukaku and Alexis Sanchez inspired Manchester United to a 2-0 win against Huddersfield at Old Trafford.After the game, Ben Mee, Gudmundsson and Vincent Kompany all spoke to Sky Sports, while Pep Guardiola and Sean Dyche gave their reflections on the 1-1 draw.We also heard from Neville, Henry and Heaton on Raheem Sterling's miss of the season contender, Ederson's superb performance and Paul Pogba after he was named on the substitute's bench for United's clash with Huddersfield.You can hear all that, plus plenty more, in the latest podcast.Hit the link above to hear the latest podcast in full and subscribe via iTunes.
